Author: helloaveragejoe
Text: First, you’re so brave for sharing this story with us. It sounds like you experienced lots of bumps in the road. I’m sorry for you feeling this way, hug! Second, please seek help with a therapist or counselor. You deserve a healthy life that you enjoy to the fullest with your kids!! I’m not here to judge, since I’m in your boat, but seeing a therapist does help! Again thanks for sharing, lots of love!
